trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement iOS SDK Overview
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement iOS SDK Overview

trans-unit.source: Latest updates and procedures for iOS SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Latest updates and procedures for iOS SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: iOS SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: iOS SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: Start here to get all the details on how to integrate Azure Mobile Engagement in an iOS App.
trans-unit.target: Start here to get all the details on how to integrate Azure Mobile Engagement in an iOS App.

trans-unit.source: If you'd like to give it a try first, make sure you do our [15 minutes tutorial](mobile-engagement-ios-get-started.md).
trans-unit.target: If you'd like to give it a try first, make sure you do our [15 minutes tutorial](mobile-engagement-ios-get-started.md).

trans-unit.source: Click to see the [SDK Content](mobile-engagement-ios-sdk-content.md)
trans-unit.target: Click to see the [SDK Content](mobile-engagement-ios-sdk-content.md)

trans-unit.source: Integration procedures
trans-unit.target: Integration procedures

trans-unit.source: Start here: [How to integrate Mobile Engagement in your iOS app](mobile-engagement-ios-integrate-engagement.md)
trans-unit.target: Start here: [How to integrate Mobile Engagement in your iOS app](mobile-engagement-ios-integrate-engagement.md)

trans-unit.source: For Notifications: [How to integrate Reach (Notifications) in your iOS app](mobile-engagement-ios-integrate-engagement-reach.md)
trans-unit.target: For Notifications: [How to integrate Reach (Notifications) in your iOS app](mobile-engagement-ios-integrate-engagement-reach.md)

trans-unit.source: Tag plan implementation: [How to use the advanced Mobile Engagement tagging API in your iOS app](mobile-engagement-ios-use-engagement-api.md)
trans-unit.target: Tag plan implementation: [How to use the advanced Mobile Engagement tagging API in your iOS app](mobile-engagement-ios-use-engagement-api.md)

trans-unit.source: Release notes
trans-unit.target: Release notes

trans-unit.source: Fix iOS 9 compatibility bug with a third party library.
trans-unit.target: Fix iOS 9 compatibility bug with a third party library.

trans-unit.source: It was causing crashes while sending polls results, application information or extra data.
trans-unit.target: It was causing crashes while sending polls results, application information or extra data.

trans-unit.source: For earlier version please see the [complete release notes](mobile-engagement-ios-release-notes.md)
trans-unit.target: For earlier version please see the [complete release notes](mobile-engagement-ios-release-notes.md)

trans-unit.source: Upgrade procedures
trans-unit.target: Upgrade procedures

trans-unit.source: If you already have integrated an older version of Engagement into your application, you have to consider the following points when upgrading the SDK.
trans-unit.target: If you already have integrated an older version of Engagement into your application, you have to consider the following points when upgrading the SDK.

trans-unit.source: You may have to follow several procedures if you missed several versions of the SDK see the complete [Upgrade Procedures](mobile-engagement-ios-upgrade-procedure.md).
trans-unit.target: You may have to follow several procedures if you missed several versions of the SDK see the complete [Upgrade Procedures](mobile-engagement-ios-upgrade-procedure.md).

trans-unit.source: For each new version of the SDK you must first replace (remove and re-import in xcode) the EngagementSDK and EngagementReach folders.
trans-unit.target: For each new version of the SDK you must first replace (remove and re-import in xcode) the EngagementSDK and EngagementReach folders.

trans-unit.source: Dropped support for iOS 4.X.
trans-unit.target: Dropped support for iOS 4.X.

trans-unit.source: Starting from this version the deployment target of your application must be at least iOS 6.
trans-unit.target: Starting from this version the deployment target of your application must be at least iOS 6.

trans-unit.source: If you are using Reach in your application, you must add `remote-notification` value to the `UIBackgroundModes` array in your Info.plist file in order to receive remote notifications.
trans-unit.target: If you are using Reach in your application, you must add `remote-notification` value to the `UIBackgroundModes` array in your Info.plist file in order to receive remote notifications.

trans-unit.source: The method `application:didReceiveRemoteNotification:` needs to be replaced by `application:didReceiveRemoteNotification:fetchCompletionHandler:` in your application delegate.
trans-unit.target: The method `application:didReceiveRemoteNotification:` needs to be replaced by `application:didReceiveRemoteNotification:fetchCompletionHandler:` in your application delegate.

trans-unit.source: "AEPushDelegate.h" is deprecated interface and you need to remove all references.
trans-unit.target: "AEPushDelegate.h" is deprecated interface and you need to remove all references.

trans-unit.source: This includes removing `[[EngagementAgent shared] setPushDelegate:self]` and the delegate methods from your application delegate:
trans-unit.target: This includes removing `[[EngagementAgent shared] setPushDelegate:self]` and the delegate methods from your application delegate:

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
